objects.name: Analytic 0910
objects.description: Execution of QEMU, KVM, or VirtualBox processes with unusual flags (e.g., '-nographic', '-snapshot'). File creation of VM images in atypical directories. Defender view: monitoring audit logs for process executions and file modifications linked to hidden virtualization.

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: auditd:SYSCALL
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: execve calls for qemu-system*, kvm, or VBoxHeadless

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: auditd:SYSCALL
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: File creations of *.qcow2, *.vdi, *.vmdk outside standard VM directories

x_mitre_mutable_elements.description: Legitimate VM image storage paths to reduce false positives.
Correlate suspicious VM execution with non-admin or service accounts.
